about_the_game:
Sea Raiders is an innovative pirate-themed massively collaborative game for streamer-viewer communities, played directly on Twitch.

Streamer-captain and viewer-crew go together on adventures, winning battles and solving puzzles in order to find treasures and develop their own unique island and characters.

The game features:

  • Seamless instant play between streamers and all viewers

  • Massively Collaborative Actions / Challenges

  • Cross Stream Progression

As a streamer you are the captain of the island and lead adventures.

Viewers are the crew, they influence the adventures and participate in all the scenes.

Everybody has to collaborate in real time.

How does it work ?

Stream the game on your channel, viewers use a custom made rich extension to participate in without having to install anything.

The project is currently in closed concept testing.

We are designing the game for and with streamers and their communities.

Join our Discord to learn more and participate in future tests and design discussions.

Thanks
